title: Silver Support main lookin for duo buddy
body:
So, stuck in ELO HELL because people have the firm believe that playing a champ for the first time and not knowing anything about them or intentionally feeding or just afking/semi afking wins games. Yeah, i'm not sure either. 

So, S5-4 (can't remember, getting trolls that much. THANKS RITO) support lookin for an TOP/JNG.
Leona/Thresh main. 
Will off play Soraka/Ali/Brand.

replies.body: Hey man I'd love to try and climb if your up for it
hey bud, you might have accidentally stumbled onto the wrong place (this is oce boards)
I'll add you if you want I'm b1 right now with 100 ranked games
doesnt phase me fam, ill premuch play with anyone

Hey, I main Adc I'm a Tristana main looking to learn new champs. I'm S4 and also looking for a duo partner.

IGN- ShadowAquarius
hey, b2/b1, play draven so he works really well with leona and thresh.
